@c.walker.23 & arcname: You both need to use the VLC player which is free and is compatible with every codec I have come up to! Google it!
As for your problem c.walker, WMP is notorious for this kind of problems... I once deleted a great torrent because it had no sound on WMP then downloaded it again 6 months later and played it using VLC. Encountered no problems ever since! WMP however is horrendous for videos...

@arcname

The video you downloaded is probably garbage files or the CoDec is full of Malware if it won't download auto-WMP or DiX Player.
